title: FS: MANY Ray Demmitt (St. Louis) T-206s - Remaining Moved to eBay
author: JP

posts.post_title: FS: MANY Ray Demmitt (St. Louis) T-206s - Remaining Moved to eBay
posts.post_content:
Took a bath on my REA consignment (no surprise) and so I'm doing a little fundraising.  Buy these now or they'll be hitting the bay soon!  I'll accept Paypal + 3% (unless sending "gift" or "payment owed"), cashier's checks, or money orders. All prices include shipping...

[url]http://imageevent.com/jmpkcp/ebayrays[/url]

Authentic-Altereds are $900 (#16593627 SOLD and #16538526 SOLD)
Authentic is $1000 Moved to eBay
PSA 1 (MK) is $1000 SOLD
PSA 1s are $1200 Moved to eBay
PSA 1.5 is $1500 (#14821502 is SOLD)

I will consider offers, especially on purchases of multiples.  PM me with offers, or if you want an individual card at the prices listed, post in this thread the PSA serial number and you've got it!
Ray, PM received and I responded back. Let me know if you have any other questions...

JP,

Thanks for the Demmitt #16593627.  It is appreciated.

Spoils of war can sometimes be brutal.  Hang in there!

Lovely Day...
One sold, one listed on eBay. If you want one before it hits the bay, please post here or PM. Emails may incur a slight delay as my wife's contractions are 13 minutes apart...
PSA 1.5 is sold. Thanks Bill! Enjoy!
Last of the PSA Authetnic-Altereds is SOLD.  Thanks Rick!

Congrats on the new addition to the family, and my condolences to the bath you took on the Plank, but do you really think its fair to others for you to bump this post 3-4 times per day? Wouldnt a regular old "edit" to the original post do the same thing as your extra posts are doing?

Thanks and thanks.  Six is one half of a dozen.  It would be the same if they posted the cards they wanted in this thread, that would've bumped it the same....if you have an issue, bring it up with a Mod but please don't post commentary in my BST thread.

FYI, you bumped a BST post you made one day later because of no response....the normal wait time is a week or two before bumping your own thread.  That is a far worse offense than me bumping to thank buyers and update what is left.
Nice pickup on the Joss, Rob!

Chicago I thought Leon had to step in and tell everyone that unless you’re buying or dealing stay out of BST threads with comments. 

I think this was done because a person named (insertcitynamehere206) was crying like a baby from help from the very same thing you have done here and in other BST's.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=122946[/url]

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=122489[/url]

I think it was Leon saying something like the next person who does this in a BST thread gets a timeout....consider yourselves warned something along those lines.

Now by definition I'm breaking the rule here pointing out your constant button pushing (Irony)...so I'll take my lump and timeout from Leon but on my way out for breaking the rule how about I escort you to the door?

John

Anyone that has an issue with the way things are happening on the board should PM me or another moderator. We can take care of it. That way it will keep you from getting into arguments. It is true that a BST post really shouldn't be bumped so often, but again, that is what the other mods and I are here to help with. Thanks a lot.

Hi JP,
Thanks for the quick shipping on the Demmitt.  I have been wanting one for quite a while.  Good luck on your ebay sales.

Time to start looking for O'hara.

Rick
